questions.question: This type of system monitors network traffic for suspicious activity and takes action to block or prevent it.
questions.answer: What is an Intrusion Prevention System (IPS)?

questions.question: This type of IPS uses predefined attack signatures to detect and block known threats.
This term refers to the practice of analyzing network traffic patterns to identify and block anomalies.
This type of IPS is installed on individual devices to monitor and prevent malicious activity.
This open-source IPS is widely used for network intrusion prevention and detection.
